models

Class ScheduledExpense

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.ScheduledExpense

  • public class ScheduledExpense
extends java.lang.Object
    ScheduledExpense Creates Expense instances based on a user specified date and repetition period. Invoked by the Schedule Actor on a period specified in Global

      boolean update(long scheduledExpenseId)
      Updates a scheduled expense and, expense instances created by that scheduled expense Expense instances are updated if they were created after the date in the schedueled expense object.
